Detailed Description

A data structure for a Matlab parameter's attributes.

char** argument::dims
 

The exact dimensions.

Optionally set by the -size(*)={<explicit_setting>} flag

int argument::explicit_allocate
 

Boolean value representing whether the data field of the output parameter is explicitly allocated in "kernel" block.

Optionally enabeled by -explict(<outout_parameters>) flag

Definition at line 74 of file argument.h.

Referenced by add_input(), add_output(), display_outputs(), and set_explicit_outputs().

char* argument::size
 

The name of the parameter of Identical size.

Optionally set with the -size(<parameters_list>)=<input_parameter> & "-identical" flag
for an input parameters, it is for checking that size of both input parameters are identical
for an output parameters, it is for setting the size of an output parameter to the size of an input parameter

Definition at line 44 of file argument.h.

Referenced by add_input(), add_output(), create_outputs(), display_inputs(), display_outputs(), generate_mex(), set_active_size(), set_default_size(), set_identical_size(), and update_identical_parameters().

char* argument::type
 

The name of the parameter of Identical type.

Optinally set with the "-type" flag
used in a similar way as the sie field

Definition at line 60 of file argument.h.

Referenced by add_input(), add_output(), display_inputs(), display_outputs(), generate_mex(), set_default_type(), set_identical_type(), and update_identical_parameters().
